title: lateral movement techniques
extract: Network Lateral Movement, or what is more commonly referred to simply as, "Lateral Movement", refers to the techniques cyber attackers, or "threat actors", use to progressively move through a network as they search for the key data and assets that are ultimately the target of their attack campaigns.
extract_html: Network Lateral Movement, or what is more commonly referred to simply as, "Lateral Movement", refers to the techniques cyber attackers, or "threat actors", use to progressively move through a network as they search for the key data and assets that are ultimately the target of their attack campaigns.
